name: Root Fossil
effect: Play Root Fossil as if it were a {C} Basic Pokémon. (Root Fossil counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Root Fossil is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokémon.) Root Fossil can’t be affected by any Special Conditions and can’t retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Root Fossil from play. (This doesn’t count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.)
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Spongy Stone
poke_body.effect: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Root Fossil.
